Package it.polimi.is23am10.server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.is23am10.server.Server
public class Server extends Object
The Server entry point class definition. This has only static methods and this class should not be instantiated.

  • Constructor Details

    • Server

      public Server(ServerSocket serverSocket, ExecutorService executorService, IServerControllerAction rmiServerControllerActionServer, Registry rmiRegistry) throws RemoteException
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      serverSocket - The server socket reference of a newly connected client.
      executorService - The built thread executor service.
      rmiServerControllerActionServer - An built instance of the implementing class.
      rmiRegistry - A built instance of the RMI registry.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - On rebind failure.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start(AppConfigContext ctx)
      Server entry point. A new ServerSocket instance is spawned and in a infinity loop listens for clients connections.
      Parameters:
      ctx - An instance of the server configuration.

    • stop

      public void stop() throws IOException
      Stop the serverSocket.
      Throws:
      IOException - On socket closure failing.

    • status

      public Server.ServerStatus status()
      Check the current serverSocket status.
      Returns:
      The an enum Server.ServerStatus stating the current status.

    • getSocketClientsConnected

      public static int getSocketClientsConnected()
      Get the current number of clients connected to the socket.
      Returns:
      The connect clients number.

    • setSocketClientConnected

      public static void setSocketClientConnected(int scc)
      Set the current number of clients connected to the socket.
      Parameters:
      scc - The connect clients number.
